sentences.sContent: She was deflated when Fen made no comment on her achievement.
sentences.sCn: 芬对她的成就没作任何评论，她很泄气。

synos.tran: 放气；使缩小；紧缩通货；打击；使泄气

words.tran: 紧缩指数；平减物价指数；扣除通货膨胀因素的价格指数
抽气；使泄气（deflate的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 放气；使缩小；紧缩通货；打击；使泄气
trans.tranOther: if a tyre,  balloon  etc deflates, or if you deflate it, it gets smaller because the gas inside it comes out
